title: Detroit Tigers average ticket price 2006 to 2019
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.

Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2006 to 2007, gradually increasing from 2007 to 2008, slightly decreasing from 2008 to 2009, slightly increasing from 2009 to 2011, and finally roughly constant from 2011 to 2015.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2010 and 2011.
Maximum Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, about 31.0 was reported at Year 2012
The lowest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 18.48 was reported at Year 2006
